name: Kadetstvo: Novaya Istoriya
storyline: there is a new student at the Suvorov Military School - cadet Sergei Strelkov. Together with him, the player experiences all the delights of cadet life: studying, exams, jokes about teachers, noisy breaks and, of course, school discos - the first slow dance and the first kiss.
summary: The game will have a new meeting with the heroes of the popular TV series: the charming bully Makarov, the handsome intellectual Sukhomlin, the kind Perepechko, ensign Kantemirov, General Matveyev and other old acquaintances.
